item.description:
Our April 11, 2011 speaker will be John Mosher, inventor and developer of the Snow-Bow, an egonomically designed snow shovel.  John is an industrial designer living in Hopkinton who has left corporate employment to launch superior consumer products. See the video of the Snow-Bow at his website: http://www.snow-bow.com/

Arrive as early as 6:30 to network with others. The meeting starts promptly at 7:00. A map of MIT showing the meeting location is at http://whereis.mit.ed.... Street parking is suggested on Ames Street or Memorial Drive. Most MIT buildings have easy access and are interconnected.

For more about the Inventors Association of New England, go to our website at www.inventne.com
item.name: Inventors Association of New England Monthly Meetup
